CustomField.formula: IF ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 10 , 3000, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 10, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 25), 3500, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 25, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 50), 5000, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 50, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 75), 7000, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 75, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 100), 9000, IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 100, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 150), 10000 + (60*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 150, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 200), 10000 + (60*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 200, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 300), 10000 + (60*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 300, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 400), 10000 + (60*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 400, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 500), 10000 + (60*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 500, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 750), 15000 + (47.5*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( AND ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c > 750, Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c <= 1000), 20500 + (39*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), IF ( Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c >= 1001, 21500 + (38*(Opportunity__r.Number_of_Employees__c-100)), 0 )))))))))))))
CustomField.label: EPLI Base Rate
